name: Crazy Plane
description:
English::

Controls
WASD : Movement
Shift : Hold to Turbo
Mouse : Look around
Space : Jump
E     : Fill the fuel on gas stations.(10 points)
B     : Change Plane

Game Rules
- Choose a mission to play, 4 options to choose from diffuculty is scaled from top to bottom. 
- Reach the target while fulfilling the requirements.(Passenger to transfer & Time)
- Manage your fuel so it wont run out.
- If you run out of fuel you will lose half of your points and you will fail your mission if you are in one.

Tips
- In early levels try to reach the target as fast as possible while picking up passengers.
- Since you have no money at start you should go for the target right away.
- You should upgrade your move speed first.
- Avoid upgrading your passenger capacity early levels.

NOTE:
If you get stuck and lost a lot of money just restart the game there is no save atm.
Turkce::
Kontroller
WASD : Hareket
Shift : Turbo
Mouse : Etrafa Bakin
Space : Zipla
E     : Benzincide benzin doldur.(10 points)
B     : Ucagi Degistir.

Oyun Mekanikleri
- Verilen 4 gorevden birini sec, bu gorevler yukaridan asagiya dogru zorluk seviyesi artmaktadir.
- Gorevin sartlarini tamamlayarak hedefe ulasmaya calis.(Minimum yolcu sayisi & Zaman)
- Benzinini tasarufflu kullan ki bitmesin.
- Benzinin biterse elinde olan puanlarin yarisini kaybedersin ve gorevdeysen gorevi kaybetmis sayilirsin.
Ipuclari
- Oyun baslarinda fazladan yolcu almaya calismaktan ziyade bir an once hedefe ulasmaya calisin.
- Oyun basi paraniz olmadigi icin benzini dolduramazsiniz o yuzden benzin bitecektir.
- Oncelikli olarak hareket hizini gelistirmenizi oneririm.
- Erken oyunda yolcu kapasitesini gelistirmenizi onermem.
NOT
- Eger oyun basinda parasiz kalip takili kalirsaniz oyunu yeniden baslatin, kayit sistemi suanda olmadigi icin bu cozumu kullanabilirsiniz.
